name: Transformational Coaching Model
description: The Transformational Coaching Model focuses on deep personal change by addressing beliefs, identity, and purpose. It encourages clients to go beyond surface goals to shift perspectives and create lasting transformation.

current_patterns.title: What patterns or beliefs do you notice?
current_patterns.description: Identify recurring patterns and underlying beliefs

reality_impact.title: How do these impact your current reality?
reality_impact.description: Explore how current patterns affect your life and outcomes

questionable_assumptions.title: What assumptions could be questioned?
questionable_assumptions.description: Challenge underlying assumptions and taken-for-granted beliefs

limiting_beliefs.title: What beliefs may no longer serve you?
limiting_beliefs.description: Identify beliefs that are holding you back or limiting growth

desired_identity.title: Who do you want to become?
desired_identity.description: Envision the transformed version of yourself

transformed_life.title: What would a transformed life look like?
transformed_life.description: Create a vision of life after transformation

values_alignment.title: How do your goals align with your deeper values?
values_alignment.description: Examine alignment between goals and core values

congruence_shifts.title: What shifts are needed for congruence?
congruence_shifts.description: Identify what needs to change to create alignment and congruence

transformation_steps.title: What steps will you take toward transformation?
transformation_steps.description: Define specific actions to support transformation

pattern_reinforcement.title: How will you reinforce new patterns?
pattern_reinforcement.description: Plan how to strengthen and maintain new positive patterns
